\fancypagestyle{laststyle}
{
   \fancyhf{}
   \chead{\thepage}
   \fancyfoot[L]{\copyright NJC }
   \fancyfoot[R]{\textbf{END}} %Put \thispagestyle{laststyle} in the last page
}
